description: Try our easy to follow Steak Sub With Sweet Potato Chips recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Steak sandwich,High protein,Seafood free,Sweet potato,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Low sugar,Spinach,Beef,Peanut free
name: Steak Sub With Sweet Potato Chips Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tbs oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook onion for 8 minutes or until soft and golden brown. Remove from pan.
Reheat frying pan over high heat. Coat steaks with remaining oil and season. Cook, in batches, for 1 minute on each side or until golden brown.
Place bottom half of toast on a large chopping board. Spread with aioli, top with spinach, tomato, beetroot, steaks, onion and cheese.
Add a few chips, if using, sandwich with toast lid and cut into 6 sandwiches to serve.
